sys:positions.organization: Baitadi district committee of the Nepali Congress
sys:positions.title: District Committee Chairman

description: Chatur Bahadur Chand (born 25 July 1971) is a Nepalese politician and cricket administrator. Affiliated with the Nepali Congress, he serves as the district committee chairman of the party's Baitadi district committee. He has been the president of the Cricket Association of Nepal (CAN) since 29 September 2019, after being re-elected for a second term on 23 September 2023.
short_description: Nepalese politician and cricket administrator who is the current president of the Cricket Association of Nepal.
